description:
http://anidb.net/ch80776 [Silky] was once a banshee, whose clan had all died out. She wandered around aimlessly until http://anidb.net/ch92257 [Spriggan] crossed her path. He takes her to a lit home (likely inhabited by http://anidb.net/ch80775 [Elias]) and transforms her into a Silky.
Source: Mahou Tsukai no Yome Wiki
name: Silky
